appendix.title: Encoding
appendix.para: HashEncoding.aliases Maps encoding aliases to their canonical names.

Encoding or nilEncoding.compatible?ab Compares the encoding of its two arguments, which are either Encoding objects or objects associated with encodings. If they are compatible, returns the encoding which would result from their combination; otherwise, nil.
EncodingEncoding.default_external Returns the default external encoding.
EncodingEncoding.default_external=encoding Sets the default external encoding to encoding, which may be an Encoding object or an encoding name.
Encoding or nilEncoding.default_internal Returns the default internal encoding, or nil if there isnâ€™t one.
EncodingEncoding.default_internal=encoding Sets the default internal encoding to encoding, which may be an Encoding object, an encoding name, or nil.

EncodingEncoding.findencoding Returns the Encoding object representing the named encoding, raising an ArgumentError for invalid names. encoding may be a String or Symbol and may name an encoding alias. An encoding of external returns the default external encoding; filesystem, the filesystem encoding; internal, the default internal encoding; and locale, the locale encoding.
ArrayEncoding.list Returns an Array of Encoding objects currently loaded. Aliases are excluded.
StringEncoding.locale_charmap Returns the name of the locale charmap encoding, if it could be derived from the environment, or nil.
ArrayEncoding.name_list Returns the names of the currently loaded encodings as an Array of Strings. Aliases are included.
true or falseEncoding#ascii_compatible? Returns true if the receiver is ASCII-compatible; false, otherwise.
true or falseEncoding#dummy? Returns true if the receiver is a dummy encoding; false, otherwise.
StringEncoding#name Returns the name of this encoding.
ArrayEncoding#names Returns the name of this encoding and those of its aliases as an Array of Strings.
EncodingEncoding#replicatename Returns a replica of the receiver named name; raises an ArgumentError if the given name is already in use.
